name: Alice's Mom's Rescue
description: Alice's Mom's Rescue is an indie puzzle / platformer game in the pure style of old school pixel art. The giant raven has captured Alice's mother. Help Alice save her mother through the 3 worlds and 25 levels! Change Alice's height by jumping on the magic mushrooms to get through the tiny spaces.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: x86 Storage: 20 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game may sound like a children's everyday game, but it's actually a neat puzzle platformer. This puzzle solving is ingenious, the character I actually find adorable, and the programming is well designed. Anyone who's into platforming games, who want to try something new, this is the game for them.

Too linear. Basic platformer with sluggish controls. You can get stuck.  Story is generic. Music is extremely monotonous - and not in the relaxing but annoying way. Massive tearing.  Change of language does nothing. Keeps using the system language.  Only the graphics is cute-ish.
